item.description:
For a total night of entertainment. Dinner at 7:30 and Karaoke at 9:30.  We can have a double dose of fun at the Butterfly Restaurant/Koi Lounge.

This is the real deal, the type of venue that might appeal to karaoke singers who think they really could be on “American Idol.” They’ve got great sound equipment so even if you don’t sing great, the audio quality will give your performance a boost. Karaoke nights are always a big deal, so get there early (begins at 9:30 p.m., with no cover charge) and plan to stay late. Crowds get so into it that they run until closing time!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or Roseann...Cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: C'Mon!! Let's Do Karaoke AGAIN!! Butterfly Restaurant and Koi Lounge!!!
